query:
SELECT 
  'research_publications' as tbl, 
  COUNT(*) as cnt,
  MIN(publicationYear) as min_year,
  MAX(publicationYear) as max_year
FROM research_publications
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'glossary_terms' as tbl, 
  COUNT(*) as cnt,
  NULL as min_year,
  NULL as max_year
FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'data_sources' as tbl, 
  COUNT(*) as cnt,
  NULL as min_year,
  NULL as max_year
FROM data_sources;
